services.title: Web Design
services.description: Beautiful and elegant designs with interfaces that are intuitive, efficient and pleasant  to use for the user.

services.title: Developement Web
services.description: Custom web development tailored to your specifications, designed to provide a flawless user experience.

services.title: Developement Mobile
services.description: Design and transform website projects into mobile apps to provide a seamless user experience.

projects.subtitle: Website
projects.title: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive e-commerce platform using the MERN stack. The website integrates user-friendly interfaces for easy navigation and a secure payment gateway.

projects.subtitle: Website
projects.title: Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Created a comprehensive restaurant management system including POS (Point of Sale) and KDS (Kitchen Display System). Developed an Electron-based client application with a web dashboard using React.js, and a robust backend with Node.js. Features include order management, inventory tracking, and real-time updates.

projects.subtitle: App & Website
projects.title: Grocery App and Website
projects.description: Developed a grocery shopping solution consisting of a mobile app using React Native and a website using React.js. Integrated backend services with Node.js, offering features such as product search, user authentication, order processing, and delivery tracking.
